description: This insulated Bridger is slightly shorter than their 10” model for a faster and lighter option. The 8” insulated Bridger features 200g of Freeze Guard Insulation, and is a great option for snowshoeing or winter hikes thanks to its molded heel kick and winterized Granite Peak Outsole.
name: Oboz Bridger 8" Insulated B-Dry, Wide - Mens
